post.text: On this day in 1872, Susan B. Anthony voted in a presidential election—and was then arrested. Almost 50 years later, the Nineteenth Amendment was ratified, prohibiting states from denying women the right to vote. hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Ethan
comment.text: North Carolina and Florida we need your votes for victory. TRUMP FOR PRESIDENT ✔✔
